
NuGet package: https://www.nuget.org/packages/FarNet.CopyColor

= 2.1.1 =

Updated package info after moving to GitHub.

= 2.1.0 =

The package moved to NuGet as "FarNet.CopyColor"

= 2.0.2 =

Adapted for FarNet 5.0.31

= 2.0.1 =

Use FarNet 5.0.1. Some fixes + only Colorer's colors are used.

= 2.0.0 =

Adapted for Far3 + FarNet5.
